Keyboard shortcuts for the Arduino IDE

A visual cheat-sheet for the 12 keyboard shortcuts found in the Arduino IDE

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Save

  • Ctrl
  • S

Save as

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • S

Open a new sketch

  • Ctrl
  • N

Open an existing sketch

  • Ctrl
  • O

Close the Arduino IDE

  • Ctrl
  • Q

Verify

  • Ctrl
  • R

Upload

  • Ctrl
  • U

Find

  • Ctrl
  • F

Adjust the alignment and spacing

  • Ctrl
  • T

Comment

  • Ctrl
  • /

Open the serial monitor

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • M

Open the sketch folder

  • Ctrl
  • K
